meanings.sent1: The tornado obliterates everything in its path.
meanings.sent2: The bomb obliterates the entire building in seconds.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's laser vision obliterates the villain's evil plans.
meanings.sent4: The unstoppable force of nature obliterates all obstacles in its way.
meanings.sent5: The volcanic eruption obliterates the peaceful landscape with its fiery rage.

meanings.sent1: The flood obliterates the small town, leaving nothing behind.
meanings.sent2: The virus obliterates the population of the village.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon obliterates the picnic basket in search of food.
meanings.sent4: The powerful storm obliterates any hope of a calm day.
meanings.sent5: The tsunami obliterates the coastal town with its massive waves.

meanings.sent1: The time-traveler accidentally obliterates his own future by changing the past.
meanings.sent2: The dictator's regime obliterates any opposition to maintain control.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick obliterates the audience's expectations.
meanings.sent4: The cosmic event obliterates the boundaries of known reality.
meanings.sent5: The black hole obliterates all matter that comes near its gravitational pull.
